resources.string: Check this box to save your data and use it next time
Click here to access your previously saved data
The identification document is not valid
You can find it in your card
Remember that you can update your contact information at ClicSalud+or at your centro de salud.
Unlock your phone to retrieve saved users
Unlock your phone to save user
To access this functionality it is necessary to check your mobile phone.\nThe mobile phone that you are going to write down has to appear as your contact in the Andalusian Health service.
If you have not received the validation code, you can request another
Access all available authentication methods from here
If the cell phone recorded as your contact at the Andaluz Health Service, you will receive a validation code that you have to introduce here.

Mediante su DNI3.0 y la tecnología NFC podrá autenticarse de un modo seguro en la aplicación para acceder a diferentes funcionalidades. Asegúrese de que su dispositivo dispone de la tecnología NFC y ésta está activada. Siga los siguientes pasos para completar con éxito la autenticación:

1- Introduzca el número CAN que podrá encontrar en el frontal de su DNI3.0 y pulse Entrar.

2- A continuación acerque, hasta que esté en contacto su DNI3.0 con la parte trasera de su dispositivo, y manténgalo.

3- Le aparecerá una popup para que introduzca la clave del certificado contenido en su DNI3.0.

4- Una vez introducida y comprobada la validez de la clave y del Certificado digital, aparecerá una alerta indicando el inicio de sesión, ya estará autenticado en la App y podrá acceder a todo el contenido durante un periodo máximo de 60 minutos.

5 - Pulse Aceptar.

Es necesario que el móvil que indica conste como teléfono de contacto en la base de datos del Servicio Andaluz de Salud. A ese teléfono se le enviará un código para completar el proceso de verificación de identidad. Puede actualizar su información de contacto en ClicSalud+.

What steps should I take?

1. From a different device, access the web %1$s with your digital Certificate or Cl@ve.

2. On the web, select 'Get QR Code'. 

3. In the form that will appear in the App, read the QR code or enter it by hand along with your identification document.
Scan the QR code with this button
For future access without identification, for the duration of your session, please establish a four-digit PIN code.
The PIN entered is different from the previous one.

The PIN is only used in the mobile application for future access, it is not related to Cl @ ve or electronic DNI.\n\nFor future access, in addition to your PIN, you can use a biometric control if it is compatible with your device.
Do you want to log out?
Enter the pin defined when you logged in
"Su teléfono móvil no tiene NFC o no está activado. "
The access permission to the camera is needed to scan the QR
The scanned QR is wrong. Make sure the QR is valid and try again
It has not been possible to verify your identity. To access this functionality it is necessary to verify said identity.
Your device access credentials have changed after the information was stored. For your security, the stored information will be deleted. Do you wish to continue?
There is an error in the data entered. Please review them and try again.
For this functionality to be available, you need to enable a security mechanism (biometrics, pattern, pin...) on your mobile device. You will be able to use it after changing its settings.
